doc.previous: Formerly named Longula texensis among several other synonyms the fungus was transferred to the genus Agaricus in 2004 after molecular analysis showed it to be evolutionary related to species in that genus In 2010 its specific epithet was changed to deserticola after it was discovered that the name Agaricus texensis was illegitimate having been previously published for a different species
